title: compatibility of photo_manager_image_provider
content:
The commit of flutter remove ImageStreamCompleter.load method.
Since flutter 3.14.0, the photo_manager_image_provider need use 2.0.0 version.
image_provider flutter photo_manager ^1.0.0 “>=2.0.0 <3.14.0” ^2.0.0 ^2.0.0 ^3.14.0 ^2.0.0
